title: Historic farm property in Carroll County, Md., to be auctioned Nov. 9
text:
Located about one hour north of Washington, the property includes a 350-acre farm with crop fields, a pond, three barns, a tractor shed and silos. Twelve hunting stands are on the property, which will be divided between the farmhouse and the estate house.

The farmhouse, currently listed for sale at $500,000 with six acres, was built in 1870 and includes a large front porch, four bedrooms, three bathrooms and approximately 3,740 finished square feet.

AD

The 19,645-square-foot mansion is listed for sale at $3.9 million. This estate includes eight fireplaces, a five-car garage, nine bedrooms and 10 bathrooms. Two more bathrooms are in the pool house.

AD

The grounds include a swimming pool, a hot tub, a pool house, a tennis court, an outdoor bar and an outdoor kitchen.

The mansion has an indoor basketball court with an adjacent gym on the main level, and a bar on the lower level with a two-sided fireplace connected to a game room. A second fitness room is on the upper level above the garage. The main-level family room has a stone floor-to-ceiling fireplace, 25-foot-high-ceilings, gallery overlooks from the upper level, chandeliers and Palladian windows.

Open-house previews will be held Saturdays and Sundays from 1 to 4 p.m. A final preview will be held on Nov. 8 from 1 to 4 p.m. The on-site auction takes place on Nov. 9 with registration at 9 a.m., the estate auction at 11 a.m. and the farmhouse auction at 1 p.m.
